data.name: Steam: Rails to Riches
data.detailed_description:
The official version of one of the best board games - Steam: Rails to Riches.

Take control of a railway company, issue shares, build railroads, deliver goods along an ever changing network of tracks and stations and make profit to expand.

* üöÇ Can you finance both the most extensive track network and the most powerful locomotives?
* üõ§Ô∏è Which routes will give You the best returns on their costs?
* üé¢ Can you beat the opponents to the most profitable shipments?
* üí∞ Will you make enough money to pay your investors?

You build the tracks, upgrade towns, improve your train, and grab the right goods to make the longest, most profitable deliveries. Score your deliveries and add to your income or victory points, balancing your need to invest against your quest to win the game.
The goal of the game is to score the most victory points and become the best railway company.

Features:
- official Steam: Rails to Riches game
- original artwork
- ingame interactive tutorial
- languages: English, German, Dutch, Portuguese, Polish, French, Spanish, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese Traditional
- play with AI, with friends or both
- 3 levels of difficulty AIs with individual strategies
- 3-5 player maps
- climate sounds and music matched to maps
- adaptable animation speed
- official rules
- unique, original board game feel on your computer
- colorblind mode
- online multiplayer

AWARDS & HONORS
üèÜ 2010 Nederlandse Spellenprijs Nominee
üèÜ 2010 Lys Passion√© Winner
üèÜ 2010 Lys Passion√© Finalist
üèÜ 2010 Golden Geek Best Strategy Board Game Nominee
üèÜ 2009 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
üèÜ 2009 Golden Geek Best Gamers' Board Game Nominee

Get it now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/595930/Steam_Rails_to_Riches/

Check our our newest project!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1450330/Concordia_Digital_Edition/

data.short_description: The official version of one of the best board games - Steam: Rails to Riches. Take control of a railway company, issue shares, build railroads, deliver goods along an network of tracks and stations and make profit to expand.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese
data.reviews:
‚ÄúIt's challenging, demanding and can feel like a lot of work. Yet it's work than can feel a lot like entertainment.‚Äù
Pocket Tactics

‚ÄúThe extra depth makes this one feel like more of a grown-up board game, and for some people that's going to be a real boon.‚Äù
Pocket Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 1GB (XP), 2GB (Vista), 2GB (Windows 7) GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 630 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 670 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2
  • Storage: 670 MB available space
